topic.title: Connect Yeastar TA Gateway
topic.shortdesc: Follow the steps to connect Yeastar TA410/810 FXO VoIP gateway.

li.b: Connect TA gateway to the Internet
li.p: LAN port can be connected to router or PBX.
FXO ports can be connected to PSTN.
Connect one end of the power adapter to the gatewayâ€™s power port; plug the other end into an electrical outlet.
There's no power switch on TA410/810 gateway.
